description: Clicking on this element will navigate the user to the homepage of the website.
Clicking on this element will open the main site navigation menu.
html: <button type="button" aria-label="Open main site navigation" aria-controls="menu-panel" aria-expanded="false" i="195"></button>

description: Clicking on this element will select the departure location as Los Angeles, CA.
html: <input type="button" role="button" aria-label="Departing from Los Angeles, CA" value="Los Angeles, CA" i="364">

description: Clicking on this element will swap the departure and arrival locations.
html: <button type="button" aria-label="Swap departure and arrival location" i="379"></button>

description: Clicking on this element will select the arrival location as Las Vegas, NV.
html: <input type="button" role="button" aria-label="Arriving at Las Vegas, NV" value="Las Vegas, NV" i="391">

description: Clicking on this element will open a dialog to change the departure date.
html: <button type="button" aria-label="Change departure date Thu, Jul 27" aria-controls="dialog-date-from" aria-expanded="false" i="410">Thu, Jul 27</button>

description: Entering a date in this input field will change the departure date.
Clicking on this element will open a dialog to add passengers.
html: <button type="button" aria-label="1 Adult, Add passengers" aria-controls="dialog-products" aria-expanded="false" i="427">1 Adult</button>

description: Entering the number of passengers in this input field will update the number of passengers.
Clicking on this element will initiate a search for available trips.
Clicking on this element will navigate the user to the 'Manage My Booking' page.
html: Manage My Booking

description: Clicking on this element will navigate the user to the 'Bus Tracker' page.
Clicking on this element will navigate the user to the 'Help' page.
Clicking on this element will navigate the user to the 'Explore now' page.
Clicking on this element will navigate the user to the 'Find out what’s playing' page.
html: Find out what’s playing

description: Clicking on this element will navigate the user to the 'Window or Aisle?' page.
Clicking on this element will navigate the user to the 'Discover all your options' page.
html: Discover all your options

description: Clicking on this element will navigate the user to the 'Discover all the places you can go' page.
html:
Discover all the places you can go

Choose from almost 2,300 destinations with Greyhound, FlixBus and our connecting partners!

description: Clicking on this element will navigate the user to the 'Explore the map' page.

Clicking on this element will expand or collapse the 'Bus Travel' section in the footer.
Clicking on this element will expand or collapse the 'Discover' section in the footer.
Clicking on this element will expand or collapse the 'Greyhound' section in the footer.
Clicking on this element will expand or collapse the 'Customer Service' section in the footer.
